name: Drizella
description: Drizella is a sativa bred by Dynasty Seeds that crosses Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen. These resinous buds offer a tropical aroma, with notes of pineapple, citrus, and vanilla, delivering clear, stimulating cerebral effects that are long-lasting. This stable strain can be grown both indoors and outdoors, with a flowering time around 60 days.
descriptionPlain: Drizella is a sativa bred by Dynasty Seeds that crosses Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen. These resinous buds offer a tropical aroma, with notes of pineapple, citrus, and vanilla, delivering clear, stimulating cerebral effects that are long-lasting. This stable strain can be grown both indoors and outdoors, with a flowering time around 60 days.

highlightedReviews.text: Drizella, how do I love thee? Let me count the ways. The wonderful taste of Drizella is something to be experienced, hints of pineapple, vanilla, and notes of lavender (?) make it a tasty treat. The true love comes from the effect! Instant happy, energy with a lovely mellow drift into sleep. This isn't the Purple Afghani assault but more of a subtle lullaby. I was able to start creative projects with ease and coupled with The Flav helped chill out some serious MS blues.  MS'ers who need something to help pick them up, when life, people or circumstances have you at the end of your rope - look for the Drizella.

Buds were light and fluffy.  Thick coat of trichimomes give the buds a light orange color. At 23% this was one of the more potent strains I've sampled.  Not much in the way of distinct smell or taste.  High was a bit euphoric and not  too heavy.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Thanks to all the Leafly users who submitted strain nominations this week! Our strain database now exceeds 1,000 varieties, but our collection is far from finished so keep the suggestions coming. Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the strain Explorer!
   1. Drizella
Characteristics of Drizella:

Mostly sativa
Cross between Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Tropical pineapple, citrus, and vanilla aroma
Clear, stimulating cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   2. Star Berry Indica
Characteristics of Star Berry Indica:

Mostly indica
Cross between Sensi Star and Blueberry
Breeder: CannaVenture
Lemon and berry aroma
Heavy, relaxing effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

 
   3. Dream Police
Characteristics of Dream Police:

Balanced hybrid
Cross between AK-47 and Dreamy Bubbles
Breeder: Crazy Diamonds
Spicy and sweet floral aroma
May help ease pain and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   4. Big Sur Holy Bud
Characteristics of Big Sur Holy Bud:

Mostly sativa
Unknown lineage
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Blueberry, menthol aroma
Uplifting cerebral effects

   5. Purple Cheese
Characteristics of Purple Cheese:

Indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid
Cross between Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder
Breeder: Auto Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Can exhibit a high CBD content
Powerful full-body relief
